page.title: Basic, Single-Clause Sentences - Agreement Features
page.instruction:
Verbs and auxiliaries may also carry agreement features that force agreement with the subject, and sometimes also with the direct object. Look through the features in the chart below and check any that your language uses. In the lexicon, add the appropriate features to the relevant affixes, including pronominal clitics that may attach to the verb.
For animacy, it is most likely a property of the semantics of the individual verb whether its subject and/or object must be animate, so those features will need to be keyed on the verb entry. Since verbs are a large, open class, you do not need to mark all verbs at this point (or even ever). Mark those common verbs that come to mind that can only have an animate subject or object. For example, any "experiencer" verbs which have to do with feeling or thinking must have an animate subject. Later, when you are working on eliminating incorrect parses, you will find others that need these features.
person first_subject the subject must be first person
first_object the object must be first person
first_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be first person
first_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be first person
first_exclusive_subject the subject must be first person exclusive
first_exclusive_object the object must be first person exclusive
first_exclusive_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be first person exclusive
first_exclusive_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be first person exclusive
first_inclusive_subject the subject must be first person inclusive
first_inclusive_object the object must be first person inclusive
first_inclusive_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be first person inclusive
first_inclusive_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be first person inclusive
second_subject the subject must be second person
second_object the object must be second person
second_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be second person
second_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be second person
third_subject the subject must be third person
third_object the object must be third person
third_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be third person
third_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be third person
number singular_subject the subject must be singular
singular_object the object must be singular
singular_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be singular
singular_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be singular
dual_subject the subject must be dual
dual_object the object must be dual
dual_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be dual
dual_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be dual
plural_subject the subject must be plural
plural_object the object must be plural
plural_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be plural
plural_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be plural
gender masculine_subject the subject must be masculine
masculine_object the object must be masculine
masculine_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be masculine
masculine_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be masculine
feminine_subject the subject must be feminine
feminine_object the object must be feminine
feminine_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be feminine
feminine_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be feminine
neuter_subject the subject must be neuter
neuter_object the object must be neuter
neuter_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be neuter
neuter_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be neuter
animacy animate_subject the subject must be animate
animate_object the object must be animate
animate_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be animate
animate_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be animate
-animate_subject the subject must be inanimate
-animate_object the object must be inanimate
-animate_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be inanimate
-animate_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be inanimate
class class_##_subject the subject must be class ## (replace ## with the class number up to 30)
class_##_object the object must be class ## (replace ## with the class number up to 30)
class_##_ergative the subject of a transitive verb must be class ## (replace ## with the class number up to 30)
class_##_absolutive the subject of an intransitive verb or the object of a transitive verb must be class ## (replace ## with the class number up to 30)
